org.radarcns.management.service

Class OAuthClientService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarcns.management.service.OAuthClientService

  • @Service
public class OAuthClientService
extends java.lang.Object
    The service layer to handle OAuthClient and Token related functions. Created by nivethika on 03/08/2018.

      • findOneByClientId

        public org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.ClientDetails findOneByClientId(java.lang.String clientId)
        Find ClientDetails by OAuth client id.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client ID to look up
        Returns:
        a ClientDetails object with the requested client ID
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - If there is no client with the requested ID

      • createRefreshToken

        public ClientPairInfoDTO createRefreshToken(Subject subject,
                                            java.lang.String clientId)
                                     throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                            java.net.MalformedURLException
        Creates refresh token for oauth-subject pair.
        Parameters:
        subject - to create token for
        clientId - using which client id
        Returns:
        ClientPairInfoDTO to return.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when token URI cannot be formed properly.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - when token URL cannot be formed properly.
